entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's intentions and actions are being discussed by Harry. He is described as someone who might have misunderstood Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is having doubts about Dumbledore's intentions and is feeling angry at him.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is arguing with Hermione about whether Dumbledore is dead or not.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is trying to calm down Ron and explain the facts about Dumbledore's death.

relationships.description: Harry feels angry at Dumbledore for not explaining himself before he died.
Ron is arguing with Hermione about whether Dumbledore is dead or not.
